name: David Ramirez
text: The biggest thing for me is that it is frickin HOT here.    Unless we spent to stick fountains all over the place for cooling, man. I dunno.    Though when I think about it, introducing a ton of walkways lining artificial *waterways* would cool the city, make it more walkable, and provide more channels to prevent flooding. If we could keep people from tossing trash and sewage in....
